Hammersmith Grove was a one-way street where contraflow cycling was introduced in June 2018 under an experimental traffic order. The start and end positions of contraflow cycle lane are unspecified https://www.thegazette.co.uk/notice/3035229.

Click [here](qualitative_assessment_intro.html) to return to main page.
